H0.text: where does new crust come from in sea floor spreading. **Granitic magma**

H1.text: where does new crust come from in sea floor spreading. **Sedimentary deposits**

H2.text: where does new crust come from in sea floor spreading. **Mantle plumes**

H3.text: where does new crust come from in sea floor spreading. basaltic magma

A4.text: new magma steadily emerges onto the ocean floor and intrudes into the existing ocean crust at and near rifts along the ridge axes.

A5.text: The melt rises as magma at the linear weakness between the separating plates, and emerges as lava, creating new oceanic crust and lithosphere upon cooling.
